document_data.caption: Bucklal Boldover, [[Baelam]], and [[Elsura Dauniir]].
document_data.name: Bucklal Boldover
document_data.mainbody: '''Bucklal Boldover''' was a half-mad [[halfling]] thief in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Bucklal went with a group of his fellow halflings to sack Myth Drannor. However, all his companions died and in order to survive Bucklal was forced to eat them. He also fought [[giant spider]]s using his bare hands. Afterward, he became half-mad. From then on, he preyed upon adventurers and monsters, moving like a rat in the city's tunnels.
document_data.Activities: Bucklal wandered the ruins of Myth Drannor tormenting and stealing from adventurers, killing small prey with his bare hands, and destroying [[baatezu]] using his [[magic item]]s.
